document.full_text: the treasury said on thursday it reached an agreement to sell its remaining 6 percent equity stake in chrysler to italy's fiat  in a deal that will net washington $560 million.
document.title: treasury to sell remaining chrysler stake to fiat
lines_and_colors: the treasury said on thursday it reached an agreement to sell its remaining 6 percent equity stake in chrysler to italy's fiat  in a deal that will net washington $560 million.
